    Zero-allocation batch container for projected 2D path coordinates.

    Builds render-ready path batches from spatial buffers with clipping transitions.

    Exposes spatial peak metadata for accessibility or logging purposes.

    SpatialScratchBuffer
    Scratch buffers for SIMD paths (no allocations in hot loops).

    Packed style descriptor for spatial batch rendering.

    Internal validation utility for spatial projection consistency.
